Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union, Local 340A of New York Arbitration Cases WAG.293
1 Linear Feet (1 boxes)
undated 1
Immediate Source of Acquisition
The provenance of this collection is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.224.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
The Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 120 years after their date of creation.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union, Local 340A of New York Arbitration Cases; WAG 293; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Contents
Materials relate to the Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union Local 340A of New York, and arbitration cases such as Local 1125 v. Kelly Mutual Credit Clothing Company.
